name: CodeDrop
one_liner: A platform where developers upload bulk promo codes and users get the right code automatically based on their platform, with real-time tracking of used vs unused codes.

kill_criteria.day_30: Less than 25 developer signups with uploaded codes
kill_criteria.day_60: Less than 100 total code redemptions across all campaigns
kill_criteria.day_90: Less than 10 paying customers or $90 MRR
